summary:
Dovahkiin\'s Manor is a large mansion, which is located directly on Lake Ilinalta. 
It includes everything what a hero needs.
descriptionHtml:
Dovahkiin\'s Manor is a large mansion, which is located directly on Lake Ilinalta. 
It includes everything what a hero needs.
An alchemy laboratory, a botanical garden, an enchantment altar, a large library, 
a fully equipped blacksmith, a kitchen, a large bedroom, 
Weapon racks, display cases and mannequins,
plenty of storage space everywhere in the house for hunters and gatherers.
 
There is a small chapel too, where you can heal your diseases 
and a large maze in which a special magic item is hidden. 
In the smithy you can create a modified Daedric two-handed sword 
and a modified ebony one-handed sword.

German Version of Skyrim, maybe it work with other languages, i havn\'t try it.
author: Marcel
